name: Festival Celebrating Summer Resonance
description:
This is a slightly updated version of the game created in 3 days for the Touhou Game Jam. The majority of this version was made in 3 days, with added 2 endings and slight visual improvements made in the past week. 

Next update would be a story re-haul with a more cohesive story and better visuals. Unfortunately story had to be more rushed than usual due to necessity for Japanese translation for the Game Jam.

There are 5 endings:

1 Flan Just wanted a friend ~

2 Unsolved Plot

3 Error 495

4 Return to Normal

5 Resonance

Team:

SFX: Synthmusic Solstice
BGM: Lowlands Blossom
Reimu: Punderfullll
Sumireko: Ulkens123
Flandre: Midori.li
Yukari, Art, Development: Copper Reverie
Japanese Translation: Oborochi & DracoGideon
